recipesJson.name: banana split cookie
recipesJson.author: Jwdman
recipesJson.description:
This is the weekend challenge banana bakery. 
It's stright forward nothing that's not self explanatory .have not steeped yet saying that it was a challenge i saw on Friday but I have been enjoying this.

This will be on diyordie.com as well under the challenge.

Hope someone enjoy this as well and looking forward to see what everyone came up with.

reviews.text: This is a welcome change from all the rich, heavy ice cream recipes I've been vaping on.  To me this is more of a nice Dairy Queen soft serve with banana and supporting flavors light enough to really enjoy.  I can see myself carrying this around at work for a while.  Nicely done.
